title: Our Research
description: We are advancing the field of surface science with three main ongoing research projects:

items.title: Project 1: Catalysis and Surface Reactions
items.description: Investigating catalytic reactions at the atomic level to understand mechanisms of energy conversion.

items.title: Project 2: Surface Passivation Mechanisms
items.description: Studying the passivation of reactive surfaces to prevent corrosion and other degradation processes.

items.title: Project 3: Novel Instrumentation Development
items.description: Developing new tools and modifying existing ones to probe surfaces in ways never before possible.
